mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tp_menu_history (HISTORY_ID, MENU_ID, MENU_NAME, OPERATION_TYPE, NODE_DATA_BEFORE, NODE_DATA_AFTER, FULL_TREE_BEFORE, FULL_TREE_AFTER, OPERATOR_ID, OPERATOR_NAME, OPERATION_TIME, CREATE_TIME, CREATOR, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATOR) VALUES (#{historyId}, #{menuId}, #{menuName}, #{operationType}, #{nodeDataBefore}, #{nodeDataAfter}, #{fullTreeBefore}, #{fullTreeAfter}, #{operatorId}, #{operatorName}, #{operationTime}, #{createTime}, #{creator}, #{updateTime}, #{updator})
mapper.select: SELECT HISTORY_ID, MENU_ID, MENU_NAME, OPERATION_TYPE, NODE_DATA_BEFORE, NODE_DATA_AFTER, FULL_TREE_BEFORE, FULL_TREE_AFTER, OPERATOR_ID, OPERATOR_NAME, OPERATION_TIME, CREATE_TIME, CREATOR, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATOR FROM tp_menu_history WHERE MENU_ID = #{menuId} ORDER BY OPERATION_TIME DESC

SELECT HISTORY_ID, MENU_ID, MENU_NAME, OPERATION_TYPE, NODE_DATA_BEFORE, NODE_DATA_AFTER, FULL_TREE_BEFORE, FULL_TREE_AFTER, OPERATOR_ID, OPERATOR_NAME, OPERATION_TIME, CREATE_TIME, CREATOR, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATOR FROM tp_menu_history WHERE OPERATOR_ID = #{operatorId} ORDER BY OPERATION_TIME DESC

SELECT HISTORY_ID, MENU_ID, MENU_NAME, OPERATION_TYPE, NODE_DATA_BEFORE, NODE_DATA_AFTER, FULL_TREE_BEFORE, FULL_TREE_AFTER, OPERATOR_ID, OPERATOR_NAME, OPERATION_TIME, CREATE_TIME, CREATOR, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATOR FROM tp_menu_history WHERE OPERATION_TYPE = #{operationType} ORDER BY OPERATION_TIME DESC

SELECT HISTORY_ID, MENU_ID, MENU_NAME, OPERATION_TYPE, NODE_DATA_BEFORE, NODE_DATA_AFTER, FULL_TREE_BEFORE, FULL_TREE_AFTER, OPERATOR_ID, OPERATOR_NAME, OPERATION_TIME, CREATE_TIME, CREATOR, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATOR FROM tp_menu_history WHERE OPERATION_TIME BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} ORDER BY OPERATION_TIME DESC

SELECT HISTORY_ID, MENU_ID, MENU_NAME, OPERATION_TYPE, NODE_DATA_BEFORE, NODE_DATA_AFTER, FULL_TREE_BEFORE, FULL_TREE_AFTER, OPERATOR_ID, OPERATOR_NAME, OPERATION_TIME, CREATE_TIME, CREATOR, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATOR FROM tp_menu_history ORDER BY OPERATION_TIME DESC
